forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 13C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High around 55F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low 9C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Low 48F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers with a possible thunderstorm in the morning, then variable clouds during the afternoon with still a chance of showers. High 13C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers likely and possibly a thunderstorm in the morning, then some lingering showers still possible in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 9C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 48F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind. Potential for heavy rainfall. High 12C. Winds W at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. Potential for heavy rainfall. High 53F. Winds W at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional light rain. Low 8C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low 46F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 13C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High around 55F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Becoming windy late. Low 9C. Winds SE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Becoming windy late. Low 49F. Winds SE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 12C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 54F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 6C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 44F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two around the area in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 6C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 43F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 14C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 58F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low around 5C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 41F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 14C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 58F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 39F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High around 15C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 59F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 6C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 43F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High near 15C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High near 60F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 7C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low around 45F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.
